title: enable "max_currency_percent" in trading view signal trading
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
yes, I can only define a static volume via TradingView since it has no way to talk to my exchange and realize my available funds and define the volume based on percent of available funds.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
The change would be two fold:
1) cap total amount of portfolio that can be used by the bot, i.e. 10,000 portfolio, bot can use 50% of max == 5000.
2) define the max_currency_percent per trade: assuming I have the above, where 50% of total portfolio can be used for bot trading or 5000, I would like to allocate 1% per trade. or 50 per trade. 

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
static volume, but no way to nack a negative case other than let the exchange respond with not enough funds.  Also this could increase drawdown to unacceptable levels.

**Additional context**
- Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
- You can link a github gist to explain the feature
